decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Cultivate and Arboreal Grazer to cast powerful spells such as Genesis Ultimatum and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon. It also includes a lot of card draw and landfall triggers with creatures like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Risen Reef. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with big threats while maintaining card advantage and tempo through efficient plays and protection spells like Mystical Dispute and Aether Gust.

The deck focuses on controlling the board with removal spells like Eliminate, Aether Gust, and Heartless Act, while also utilizing powerful creatures and planeswalkers like Nissa, Who Shakes the World, Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath, Atris, Oracle of Half-Truths, and Lovestruck Beast. Enter the God-Eternals provides a strong finisher, while Paradise Druid helps ramp into your threats. The mana base is focused on Sultai colors, with Fabled Passage and Zagoth Triome helping to fix your mana. Overall, the deck aims to manage threats and outvalue opponents in a 1 vs 1 setting.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Tamiyo, Nissa, and Shark Typhoon provide card advantage and value generation, while Hydroid Krasis and Uro give the deck additional card draw and life gain. The deck also includes strong threats like Questing Beast and Polukranos to pressure the opponent's life total. The mana base is designed to support the deck's triple-color requirements and ensure consistent access to all card types.

This UW Control deck focuses on generating card advantage and controlling the board through a combination of counterspells, removal, and card draw. The deck aims to stall out the game until it can overwhelm the opponent with powerful finishers like Shark Typhoon and Elspeth Conquers Death. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as both a companion and a way to flicker valuable permanents for additional value. The deck is designed to out-value the opponent and win through attrition.

The deck focuses on quick and aggressive gameplay utilizing adventure creatures like Lovestruck Beast and Bonecrusher Giant to put pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of Lucky Clover doubles up on adventure triggers, providing additional value. Escape to the Wilds allows for card advantage and Nissa, Who Shakes the World enhances the mana base for explosive plays. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats and powerful spells, while maintaining tempo with bounce effects from cards like Brazen Borrower.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful threats. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Thought Erasure and Mystical Dispute, while also generating card advantage and value with Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Hydroid Krasis. Additionally, the deck utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Narset, Parter of Veils to further control the game and generate advantage. The deck also includes powerful late-game threats like Shark Typhoon and Casualties of War to close out the game.

The main focus of this Sultai Control deck is to utilize a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful threats to control the game and outvalue the opponent. By using cards like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Hydroid Krasis to gain card advantage and stabilize the board, along with cards like Negate and Aether Gust to disrupt the opponent's game plan, this deck aims to grind out the opponent and win through attrition. The inclusion of powerful planeswalkers like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Tamiyo, Collector of Tales also provide additional card advantage and resilience.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by countering opponent's spells, removing threats, and drawing cards to maintain card advantage. It aims to stall the game until it can establish a dominant board presence with cards like Angel of Grace and Brineborn Cutthroat. Using counterspells like Absorb and Dovin's Veto, along with removal spells like Swift Response and Aether Gust, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy and protect its own win conditions. The deck also utilizes scrying effects and card draw spells to ensure consistency in its game plan.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of removal spells, enchantments, and card advantage. The key strategy revolves around playing a long game, disrupting opponent's plans with cards like Agonizing Remorse and Doom Foretold, while generating value through cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Elspeth Conquers Death. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as a companion that allows for additional value by flickering permanents. The deck aims to outlast opponents and win through attrition and establishing a dominant board presence.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with strong, aggressive creatures like Lovestruck Beast, Questing Beast, and Stonecoil Serpent. It also utilizes cards like Primal Might and Ranger's Guile to control the board and protect its creatures. The Castle Garenbrig and The Great Henge provide additional ramp and card draw to maintain momentum. Vivien, Arkbow Ranger and Garruk's Harbinger offer additional utility and card advantage. Overall, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and outpace the opponent to secure a swift victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with strong, efficient creatures in the early game and use powerful combat tricks and removal spells to disrupt their strategy. This Mono Green Aggro deck relies on aggressive plays, mana ramping with Castle Garenbrig, and card drawing with Bonders' Enclave to maintain its momentum. The inclusion of cards like Vivien, Arkbow Ranger, Primal Might, and The Great Henge further enhances the deck's ability to create a fast and dominating board presence. It aims to finish the game quickly by consistently dealing damage before the opponent can stabilize.

The key concept of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain a relentless pace throughout the game. By utilizing sacrifice effects like Priest of Forgotten Gods and Whisper Squad, along with sacrificing creatures for value with cards like Woe Strider and Mayhem Devil, the deck aims to control the board and generate advantage while dealing damage to the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Claim the Firstborn and Rankle, Master of Pranks to disrupt the opponent's game plan and further push its aggressive strategy.

The main focus of this Sultai Control deck is to disrupt opponent's strategies using counterspells and removal spells, while also generating card advantage through cards like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Hydroid Krasis. Nissa, Who Shakes the World provides a powerful win condition by ramping up mana and creating huge threats. Shark Typhoon offers versatile threats and can be cycled for value. The deck aims to control the game until it can overwhelm the opponent with its powerful spells and creatures.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize powerful control tools to slow down the opponent's strategy while ramping up mana and card advantage through cards like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath. The deck aims to control the game through counterspells and removal spells like Aether Gust and Eliminate, while generating card advantage with cards like Shark Typhoon. The deck also includes versatile cards like Cultivate and Hydroid Krasis to help maintain control of the game and outvalue the opponent.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board and hand using a variety of disruption spells like Extinction Event and Thought Erasure. It also aims to ramp up mana quickly with cards like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath, allowing the player to play powerful threats like Hydroid Krasis and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon. The deck includes a mix of removal, card draw, and powerful win conditions to outvalue and outlast the opponent in a longer game.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with an aggressive strategy using a combination of powerful creatures like Omnath, Locus of the Roil and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath, along with efficient removal spells and counterspells. The deck aims to control the battlefield while also ramping up mana to play big threats early on. Additionally, the deck utilizes cards like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Risen Reef to generate advantage and keep the pressure on the opponent. The goal is to maintain a strong board presence and tempo to outpace the opponent and secure a quick victory.
